ai-ya2.3.5:1.1_0: Someone who understands the aggregates of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness will not completely understand.
ai-ya2.3.5:2.1_0: Or they don’t completely understand the mass of form. They’ll lead to the entire mass of form.
ai-ya2.3.5:3.1_0: He who doesn’t completely understand the mass of form.
ai-ya2.3.5:4.1_0: they will not completely understand the mass of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ya2.3.5:4.1_1: They won’t completely understand the mass of form, nor do they contemplate the mass of feeling,
ai-ya2.3.5:5.1_0: One who doesn’t completely understand the mass of feeling,
ai-ya2.3.5:6.1_0: does not understand the origin of the world, nor does form decrease of feeling ...
